data.name: Wandering Wolf
data.detailed_description:
S T R I B O G is a first person shooter with a strong focus on immersion and survival.
You will take part in unpredictable events and stories created by the game itself.
You will meet only that which exists within the framework of the game universe and its laws.
The main story follows the split in society during the Civil War in the Hard Fantasy setting.

- First person shooter

- Thoughtful levels, with Metroidvania elements

- The atmosphere of the civil war and hopelessness

- Immersion, alternative reality effect

- Workshop Support
data.about_the_game:
S T R I B O G is a first person shooter with a strong focus on immersion and survival.
You will take part in unpredictable events and stories created by the game itself.
You will meet only that which exists within the framework of the game universe and its laws.
The main story follows the split in society during the Civil War in the Hard Fantasy setting.

- First person shooter

- Thoughtful levels, with Metroidvania elements

- The atmosphere of the civil war and hopelessness

- Immersion, alternative reality effect

- Workshop Support
data.short_description: Survival-Action experience in a dead world destroyed by civil war. You have to complete your own story, fighting for survival with monsters and nature.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IntelÂ® HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This is a shooter against zombies and beasts, so you will be able to encounter this content throughout the game with the exception of the lobby.
